author: bridge-bot
content:
<KamilChNethermind> Hi there!

Just managed to execute likely all EEST benchmarks including migrated gas-benchmarks on our infra.
https://grafana.observability.ethpandaops.io/d/feo4ronhsqv40h/opcodes-benchmarking-github-action?orgId=1&from=2025-08-05T14:21:30.022Z&to=2025-08-05T14:24:50.297Z&timezone=utc&var-posgreSQL=benuragv7iuwwb&var-ClientName=$__all&var-TestTitle=$__all&refresh=auto

Seems like from new Findings:
1. Reth crashes (3 times over a whole test cycle) - sent some details on our TG group already.
2. Besu is very slow at "Mod", "ModArith", "binopsimple" test cases (below 15MGas/s)
3. Nethermind does not work at all for now (genesis hash mismatch for some reason)
4. Geth and Erigon looking pretty good and nothing new found - Geth slowest on modexp (slowest 15MGas/s), Erigon on point evaluation precompile and then modexp (above 35 Mgas/s)

author: bridge-bot
content: <KamilChNethermind> Not yet full set of tests migrated but we have it automated now and soon will replace data source for the standard machines
